trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_SEQ_00<tab>Minfilia wants to introduce you to an Ala Mhigan member of the Scions.
TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_SEQ_01<tab>Minfilia has told you of Haribehrt, a member of the Scions hailing from Ala Mhigo. Seek him out in the storage area and solicit his assistance in your investigation.

TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_SEQ_02<tab>While Haribehrt no longer has friends in the Resistance, he knows someone who does. Take yourself to Quarrymill in the South Shroud, and introduce yourself to a woman named Albreda.

TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_SEQ_03<tab>Mentioning Haribehrt's name to Albreda earns you an angry outburst. Nonetheless, she relents to your request and refers you to a man named Meffrid, a captain of the Ala Mhigan Resistance.
TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_MINFILIA_000_000<tab>Your Ala Mhigan comrade is named Haribehrt. He joined our cause in the hopes that he might find a way to liberate his homeland.
TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_MINFILIA_000_001<tab>While he spares no effort towards that endeavor, I have no doubt that he would be glad to assist you.
TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_MINFILIA_000_002<tab>If I recall correctly, Haribehrt is currently between missions. Try looking for him in the storage area.
TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_HARIBEHRT_000_010<tab>If it isn't <var 29 EB02 /var>, the Scions' rising star! Is there aught I can do for you?
TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_HARIBEHRT_000_011<tab>You wish to win the trust of the people of Little Ala Mhigo! That is a daunting task, my friend, even for our own countrymen.
TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_HARIBEHRT_000_012<tab>I would like nothing more than to help, but I'm afraid my name no longer carries weight with that lot.
TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_HARIBEHRT_000_013<tab>I used to be a member of the Ala Mhigan Resistance, you see, but I left in favor of joining the Scions.

TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_HARIBEHRT_000_014<tab>Though my allegiance may have shifted, my purpose remains ever the same─the liberation of Ala Mhigo. Yet whatever my reasons were, I abandoned my comrades, and they'll have nothing to do with me.

TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_HARIBEHRT_000_015<tab>Now, while I may have no more friends in the Resistance, I know someone who does. Her name is Albreda, and she is a resident of Quarrymill. Say my name when you meet her, and she won't lead you astray.

TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_ALBREDA_000_020<tab>Eh? You want <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> to introduce <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to the Resistance? Hah! Why the hells should I do that? Give me just one reason!

TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_ALBREDA_000_021<tab>H-Haribehrt sent you!? Grrr, that worthless whoreson... He abandons his comrades─his <var 1A 02 /var>woman<var 1A 01 /var>─and now he has the gall to ask <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> for a favor!? Simply incredible...

TEXT_GAIUSA601_00763_ALBREDA_000_022<tab>I just... I mean... <sigh> Ugh. I realize Haribehrt was only doing what he felt was right. He's a good man. And if he trusts you, then that's all I need to know. You see that bloke there? That's Meffrid, a captain of the Resistance. I hope he can give you what you need.
